title: World of Illusion
lyrics:
A person who thinks all the time
Has nothing to think about except thoughts
By thoughts I mean specifically
Chatter in the scalp
Perpetual and compulsive repetition of words
He loses touch with reality and lives in a world of illusions

Of reckoning and calculating

I'm not saying that thinking is bad

Like everything else, it's useful in moderation

We're so tied up in our minds that we've lost our senses

Time to wake up
